name: Simple Chopped Liver
author: KarenTheMiltch
summary: A simple and delicious chopped liver! My family looks forward to finding this on our table during special holidays.
ingredients: 1 pound chicken livers, rinsed and trimmed
directions: Place the eggs into a saucepan in a single layer and fill with water to cover the eggs by 1 inch
Cover the saucepan and bring the water to a boil over high heat
Once the water is boiling, remove from the heat and let the eggs stand in the hot water for 15 minutes
Pour out the hot water, then cool the eggs under cold running water in the sink
Meanwhile, heat the canola oil in a skillet over medium heat
Stir in the onion; cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes
Reduce heat to medium-low, and continue cooking and stirring until the onion is very tender and golden brown, 5 to 10 minutes more
Place onion on a plate and set aside
Stir chicken livers into the same skillet
Cook until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear
Place chicken livers on the same plate as the onions and allow to cool completely
Place chicken livers and onion in a food processor
Process until desired texture is achieved
Place liver mixture into a bowl and season with salt and sugar
